title: New: oddnesse – Somewhere Somehow
content:
oddnesse‘s debut single Somewhere Somehow is the dream pop inspired take on shoegaze that you will need to help you through the holiday period.

A driving 4/4 drum pattern lifts a fuzz soaked melody into a more up uplifting take on the usually somber genre. Bright vocals and gorgeous gentle, compelling instrumental passages, along with the aforementioned optimistic drum beat, take the track beyond a style often defined by copycat My Bloody Valentine esque production. This is especially prominent in the chorus where a soft glistening synth piece sits sympathetically under layered vocals that make the bands opening single shimmer. Definitely one to keep a close eye on going into the new year.
